nodes.text: Gespar Trin was a male individual who lived in the city Tel Bollin on the planet Endregaad, during the reign of the New Republic. In 19 ABY, Endregaad was quarantined after a viral outbreak on the world. Trin took to the streets of Tel Bollin and tried to sell glitterstim spice to be passers by, which he attempted to pass off as medicinal spice that could be used to treat the disease.
